data.message:
I'm slim shady , getting  slimmer  daily
Doc dre  is dead   his mouth open in amazement

 its papa doc up from the basement
With his pepper mint  in flint

U wanna shoot  me with yo  papa  doc"s hand gun then do it brah
Dum  dee dee Dum  where's  that coming from Ah 
I stood outside with the 5 year old in the blistering cold froze my face base  and case off 
Drop me off the nearest  bridge so I can swim the 8th mile and watch the case files 
While cheddar  Bob  swats  flies 

.now tell me something i  dunno  bout maselff
*Mic  flip 
*head spin
